summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Private After Dark MVP - both backend APIs and frontend UI working perfectly. All required features implemented and functional.
passed_tests: Root API endpoint (/api/) - returns Private After Dark API status
Health endpoint (/api/health) - returns healthy status with telegram_configured: false
Telegram info endpoint (/api/telegram/info) - properly indicates not configured
Telegram webhook endpoint (/api/webhook/telegram) - accepts POST requests
Stripe checkout creation (/api/checkout/create) - creates valid checkout sessions
Landing page hero section - displays 'Three fantasies. One private line.'
Character cards - all three (Valeria, Luna, Nyx) display with chat CTAs
Pricing section - shows Free/$0, Premium/$19, VIP/$39 tiers correctly
Safety section - displays 18+ and privacy information
Payment success page - proper loading/processing states
Payment cancel page - correct display and navigation
No error messages on any pages
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 endpoints working), Frontend: 100% (all UI elements and pages functional)
